text: yadi tum[1] donon (he nabee kee patniyo!) kshama maang lo allaah se (to tumhaare lie uttam hai), kyonki tum donon ke dil kuchh jhuk gaye hain aur yadi tum donon ek-doosare kee sahaayata karogee aapake viroodhd, to nihsandeh allaah aapaka sahaayak hai tatha jibreel aur sadaachaaree eemaan vaale aur farishte (bhee) inake atirikt sahaayak hain
